title: 111_hr5557
content: Back to School Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers who are age 55 or older an income-based tax credit for up to $2,000 of qualified tuition and related expenses, plus 25 of such expenses between $2,000 and $4,000. Adjusts the amount of such credit for inflation beginning after 2011.
